name: UpdateExistingTag
description:
Update an existing tag's information.

Use this tool to modify the details of an already existing tag. It should be called when changes to tag attributes are needed.

parameters.name: tag_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tag that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the tag to update.

parameters.name: tag_hex_color
parameters.description: The hex code representing the tag's color. Must be a valid six-digit hexadecimal value prefixed with '#'.

value_schema.description: The hex code of the tag's color.

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: The new name for the tag to be updated.

value_schema.description:
in: body

The name of the tag.
